problem_names: lemma Resolution_insert: "S \<turnstile> R \<Longrightarrow> cnf_semantics \<A> S \<Longrightarrow> cnf_semantics \<A> {R}"
lemma "S \<turnstile> R \<Longrightarrow> cnf_semantics \<A> S \<longleftrightarrow> cnf_semantics \<A> (R \<triangleright> S)"
translations: lemma Resolution_insert: "S \<turnstile> R \<Longrightarrow> cnf_semantics \<A> S \<Longrightarrow> cnf_semantics \<A> {R}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>S \<turnstile> R; cnf_semantics \<A> S\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> cnf_semantics \<A> {R}
(* Sch?ning's resolution lemma. We don't use it. *)
lemma "S \<turnstile> R \<Longrightarrow> cnf_semantics \<A> S \<longleftrightarrow> cnf_semantics \<A> (R \<triangleright> S)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<turnstile> R \<Longrightarrow>
    cnf_semantics \<A> S = cnf_semantics \<A> (R \<triangleright> S)
using Resolution_insert cnf_semantics_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?S \<turnstile> ?R; cnf_semantics ?\<A> ?S\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> cnf_semantics ?\<A> {?R}
  cnf_semantics ?\<A> ?S \<equiv>
  \<forall>C\<in>?S. clause_semantics ?\<A> C

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<turnstile> R \<Longrightarrow>
    cnf_semantics \<A> S = cnf_semantics \<A> (R \<triangleright> S)
by (metis insert_iff)
corollary Resolution_cnf_sound: assumes "S \<turnstile> \<box>" shows "\<not> cnf_semantics \<A> S"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> cnf_semantics \<A> S
proof(rule notI)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cnf_semantics \<A> S \<Longrightarrow> False
assume "cnf_semantics \<A> S"

proof (state)
this:
  cnf_semantics \<A> S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cnf_semantics \<A> S \<Longrightarrow> False
with Resolution_insert assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>?S \<turnstile> ?R; cnf_semantics ?\<A> ?S\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> cnf_semantics ?\<A> {?R}
  S \<turnstile> \<box>
  cnf_semantics \<A> S
have "cnf_semantics \<A> {\<box>}"

proof (state)
this:
  cnf_semantics \<A> {\<box>}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cnf_semantics \<A> S \<Longrightarrow> False
thus False
by(simp add: cnf_semantics_def clause_semantics_def)

proof (state)
this:
  False

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

corollary Resolution_sound: 
  assumes rp: "cnf (nnf F) \<turnstile> \<box>"
  shows "\<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> F"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> F
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> F
from Resolution_cnf_sound rp

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ?S \<turnstile> \<box> \<Longrightarrow> \<not> cnf_semantics ?\<A> ?S
  cnf (nnf F) \<turnstile> \<box>
have "\<not> cnf_semantics \<A> (cnf (nnf F))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?S \<turnstile> \<box> \<Longrightarrow> \<not> cnf_semantics ?\<A> ?S
  cnf (nnf F) \<turnstile> \<box>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> cnf_semantics \<A> (cnf (nnf F))

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> cnf_semantics \<A> (cnf (nnf F))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> F
hence "\<not>\<A> \<Turnstile> nnf F"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> cnf_semantics \<A> (cnf (nnf F))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> nnf F
unfolding cnf_semantics[OF is_nnf_nnf]

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> nnf F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> nnf F

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> nnf F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> F
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> nnf F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> F
unfolding nnf_semantics

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> F

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> \<A> \<Turnstile> F

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
